text: The 31st TCA Awards were held on August 8, 2015, in a ceremony hosted by James Corden at The Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills, California. The nominees were announced by the Television Critics Association on June 4, 2015. ==Winners and nominees== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="background:#EEDD82;"|Category ! style="background:#EEDD82;"|Winner ! style="background:#EEDD82;"|Nominees |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Comedy |align="center" | Inside Amy Schumer (Comedy Central) | *The Big Bang Theory (CBS) *Jane the Virgin (The CW) *Transparent (Amazon) *Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt (Netflix) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Drama |align="center" | The Americans (FX) | *Empire (Fox) *Game of Thrones (HBO) *Justified (FX) *Mad Men (AMC) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Movies, Miniseries and Specials |align="center" | The Jinx (HBO) | *Bessie (HBO) *The Honourable Woman (SundanceTV) *Olive Kitteridge (HBO) *Wolf Hall (PBS) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding New Program |align="center" | Better Call Saul (AMC) | *Empire (Fox) *The Flash (The CW) *Jane the Virgin (The CW) *Transparent (Amazon) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Individual Achievement in Drama |align="center" | Jon Hamm – Mad Men (AMC) | *Viola Davis – How to Get Away with Murder (ABC) *Taraji P. Henson – Empire (Fox) *Bob Odenkirk – Better Call Saul (AMC) *Matthew Rhys – The Americans (FX) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical- align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in News and Information |align="center" | Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO) | *60 Minutes (CBS) *CBS News Sunday Morning (CBS) *The Daily Show with Jon Stewart (Comedy Central) *Frontline (PBS) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Reality Programming |align="center" | The Chair (Starz) | *The Amazing Race (CBS) *Dancing with the Stars (ABC) *RuPaul's Drag Race (Logo TV) *Shark Tank (ABC) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Youth Programming |align="center" | The Fosters (ABC Family) | *Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood (PBS) *The Legend of Korra (Nickelodeon / Nick.com) *Sesame Street (PBS) *Switched at Birth (ABC Family) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Heritage Award |align="center" | Late Night / Late Show with David Letterman (NBC / CBS) | *Friends (NBC) *The Shield (FX) *Star Trek (NBC) *Twin Peaks (ABC) |- |align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical- align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Career Achievement Award |align="center" | James L. Brooks | * No other nominees |} === Multiple wins === The following shows received multiple wins: {| class="wikitable sortable" rowspan="2" style="text-align:center;" background: #f6e39c; |- ! scope="col" style="width:55px;"| Wins ! scope="col" style="text- align:center;"| Recipient |- | rowspan=1 style="text-align:center" | 2 | Inside Amy Schumer |} === Shows with multiple nominations === The following shows received multiple nominations: {| class="wikitable" rowspan="2" style="text-align:center;" background: #f6e39c; |- ! scope="col" style="width:55px;"| Nominations ! scope="col" style="text-align:center;"| Recipient |- | rowspan="2" style="text-align:center" | 4 | Empire |- | Transparent |- | rowspan="3" style="text-align:center" | 3 | The Americans |- | Jane the Virgin |- | Mad Men |- | rowspan="3" style="text-align:center" |2 | Better Call Saul |- | Game of Thrones |- | Inside Amy Schumer |- |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:2015 television awards Category:2015 in American television Category:TCA Awards ceremonies
